app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/1999-4915/12/1/71/s1, Figure S1: Quality control; Figure S2: Technical variability; Figure S3: Coverage plot of PB2, PB1 and PA of example cells; Figure S4: Amount of DI RNAs affecting the virus titer; Figure S5: Controls for and statistical analyses on the impact of ribosome quantity, fraction of viral and host cell mRNAs on single-cell virus yield (related to Figure 3); Table S1: Data of Figure 2 and Figure 3A,B; Table S2: Single-cell gene expression after quality control (QC); Table S3: Sample annotation after QC; Table S4: Small and large insert size counts; Table S5: Identified and annotated chimeric read junctions.
